head.description: General Settings for the nVidia Monitoring Applet

refreshInterval-spinner.tooltip: Increase or decrease this spinner value to change the refresh interval - use a slow refresh if you have a slow machine

showGpuTemp.description: Show GPU Temperature as well as icon
showGpuTemp.tooltip: Available in Horizontal and Vertical Panels. Display is in Degrees Centigrade.

description1.description: Display Name of Program 1 to be run using Optimus technology
description1.tooltip: Put the name of the program here or null if you do not want it displayed

commandString1.tooltip: Put the command string to run the program here starting with optirun or primusrun
